text:
MixRank - San Francisco - Engineering (Full Time, Intern)

MixRank crawls the web and collects, monitors, and does analytics on display ads. Our core technology focuses are i) web crawling, ii) distributed data systems/analytics, and iii) data mining. Our customers are advertisers, agencies, and ad networks that use our data to monitor competition and optimize campaigns.

If you're in the bay area, you're welcome to drop by our office in SoMa (next to AT&T park) on Wednesday evenings to hang out and (optionally) participate in a casual programming competition.

scott@mixrank.com
